customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
It's said that Ca'asho is always bothered by things that seem to drift around in her sight. But it's precisely these pesky disturbances that inspired her to add plenty of "drifting things" to her deck, ensuring her opponents are just as troubled as she is.
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Nilou
customize.desc:
"Dance of Lotuslight" Nilou

Steps floating like lotus petals, emerging from an intoxicating dream.

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc:
"Astral Reflection" Mona

Victory or defeat â€” it has all been written in the stars.

customize.name: Kirara
customize.desc:
"Cat Upon the Eaves" Kirara

On tails twain and padded feet, to all doors shall she deliver.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...
